name: harmlessness
content:

the quality of being harmless (= not able or likely to cause harm): He doubted claims about the drug's harmlessness. He protests too much about the harmlessness of screen violence. See
harmless
More examplesFewer examplesFor all their harmlessness, extinct volcanoes are still absorbingly interesting natural spectacles.A large cocktail with a flower in it disguises the alcohol and gives it the illusion of harmlessness.Some politicians were convinced of the harmlessness of labour market deregulation. Persuaded of his harmlessness, she allowed him to go with her.
